PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-12562017-10-19,  ,  ECCC,  , 
ActSpecies at Risk Act
SubjectEmergency Order Amending the Emergency Order for the Protection of the Greater Sage-Grouse (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisEMERGENCY ORDER AMENDING THE EMERGENCY ORDER FOR THE PROTECTION OF THE GREATER SAGE-GROUSE (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to provide greater clarity to regulatees by correcting the English wording of paragraph 4(3)(d) of the Order concerning the non-application of the prohibitions to align with wording used in the similar paragraph 3(5)(d) and the French version of paragraph 4(3)(d).
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0223 Publication Date: 2017-11-01
AttachmentsAttachment
